title: Why do people have penpals? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's a chance to meet interesting people and learn about their lives. It allows you to learn about places and things you might never get to see yourself. It makes friendship. An interesting thing is that these friendship are often bases simply on who you are as a person rather than your income or physical appearance. It gives you and them an outlet. It's nice to get something in your mailbox other than bills

I have several and many people have them through social media. I’m careful with the females ones as they can cause friction with my wife if I’m not very open and honest about them with my wife. She has full access to my social media accounts and email so she knows I’m not doing anything I shouldn’t. We’ve never had a problem here but I believe in full transparency with all female friends. She does the same with male friends.
